DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : For pilot phase , visual memory assessment test develop study adequately assess period amnesia procedure , use phase study randomize patient moderate deep sedation . The purpose randomized phase compare rate amnesia respiratory depression patient receive moderate sedation receive deep sedation . The goal determine whether moderate sedation could provide safe sedation still result adequate amnesia procedure . Secondary goal would compare duration sedation , success procedure patient sedate , procedural difficulty , rate hypotension adverse event , patient perception quality sedation ( pain recall procedure ) . Background : Adequate pain control alleviation anxiety improve quality care patient satisfaction . Numerous study find procedural sedation ( PS ) ED safe , properly administer , incidence report complication , include clinically significant respiratory depression , rare . Procedural sedation use procedure fracture reduction , dislocation reduction , cardioversion , incision drainage , chest tube placement . Propofol anesthetic agent frequently use PS Emergency Department ( ED ) produce sedation , hypnosis , amnesia , lack analgesic property . In study conduct Hennepin County Medical Center ( HCMC ) , find patient unable recall whether experienced pain procedure sedate propofol . However , possibility certain part procedure later recall patient . If extensive part procedure recall , effective sedation . Previous study memory sedation HCMC use verbal prompt , research show people readily remember image . Images may provide sensitive way determine degree amnesia sedation .
